programme.title: The 1990 World Cup
programme.short_synopsis: How interested are Americans in soccer and how will the US perform at World Cup '94?
programme.medium_synopsis: With the World Cup drawing to a close, Alistair Cooke looks forward to 1994 when the USA will hold the tournament and examines the American interest in soccer.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: The 1990 World Cup

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
